snippet: Building jokes off conversations with the crowd, Big Jay Oakerson avoids insults while sneakily skating toward the edge.
abstract: Jason Zinoman On Comedy column profiles Big Jay Oakerson, whose standup routine blends therapist's knack for putting people at ease with comedian's gift for making them uncomfortable; Oakerson is known for his ability to sum up sex lives of random people in audience with imagined and evocative detail.
lead_paragraph: Building jokes off conversations with the crowd, Big Jay Oakerson avoids insults while sneakily skating toward the edge.

headline.seo: Big Jay Oakerson, a Master of the Dirty Joke
headline.main: A Blunt Yet Kindly Bedside Manner
headline.print_headline: A Blunt Yet Kindly Bedside Manner
